ARABIC: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَرِثُ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا وَإِلَيْنَا يُرْجَعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is We who will inherit the earth and all those on it. They will be returned to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily We shall inherit the earth and whosoever is on it, and to Us they will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Ultimately, We shall inherit the earth and whatever is on it; to Us shall they be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We are the heirs of the earth and those living in it will all return to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We shall inherit the earth and all that is on it, and only towards Us will they return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We will inherit the earth and whatsoever is thereon. And to Us they all shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We inherit the earth and all those who are on it, and to Us they shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Surely We shall inherit the earth and all that are upon it, and unto Us they shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We, only We, inherit the earth and all who are thereon, and unto Us they are returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is We who will inherit the earth and all who dwell upon it: they shall all return to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We shall inherit the earth and whatsoever is thereon: and Unto Us they shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We shall inherit the earth and whoever there is on it, and to Us they shall be brought back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is We Who will inherit the earth, and all beings thereon: to Us will they all be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! We will inherit the earth and whatsoever is thereon. And to Us they all shall be returned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: For We shall inherit the earth and all that are on it. To Us, they shall return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is We who will inherit the earth and everyone on it, and to Us they will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it is We who will inherit the earth and whoever is on it, and to Us they will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:40] Indeed We (innā nahnu, [a repetition of the first person] for emphasis), shall inherit the earth and all who are on it, of rational beings and others, by destroying them, and to Us they shall be returned, thereon [on the Day of Resurrection] for requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We inherit the earth and all who are thereon,) We possess the earth; it is also said that this means: We cause to die whoever is in the earth and give them life again (and unto Us they are returned) on the Day of Judgement such that I reward them for their deeds: a good deed for a good deed and an evil deed for an evil deed.
